title: Chuang Chuang Chuang! Wo Shi Chuang Tang Tu!
synopsis: "Crush!" "I am a chopper" is a hilarious three-dimensional animation series, a rough and clever chopper, a handsome, cool but chopping knife, seemingly dumb but clumsy, but not talking but magic Gua Gua, coupled with the crazy trick-or-treating expert Rabbit Brother, together staged the happy daily life of the little friends in the town. The whole play uses a small amount of dialogue, uses antics and rich body language performances, as well as funny daily life stories, so that the rabbit and his friends will take you to experience the fun of pure animation. Must make you happy! (translated from douban)
